name: Kayden
description: Kayden Andrease Christian was born a premie at 31 weeks on 7/11/12. After spending a month in NICU he was released and for almost one full year lived a happy and healthy life. In may his mom felt a lump in his stomach and took him to the doctor to be checked. This lump was later found to be a hepatoblastoma tumor in his liver. He has since then been diagnosed with stage 3 liver cancer. Kayden was unable to celebrate, but spent his first birthday and is currently still awaiting a liver transplant in the hospital.

name: A Body of Art with bookmark
description:
Written by Marsha Badger.  "A Body of Art" Is a collection of poetry written over the last 6 years. Written in raw form, "A Body of Art" concentrates more on the beauty of words rather than grammatical structure.
 
This collection is a direct reflection of life, experience, growth, love, lust and art translated to paper. Allow the words to take you on an emotional and relatable journey.


This author is generously donating he proceeds to Beads of Hope.
